text: Jovan Divjak (11 March 1937 â€“ 8 April 2021) was a Bosnian army general. He was the Deputy Commander of the Bosnian army's main staff until 1994, during the Bosnian War. On 8 April 2021, Divjak died in Sarajevo at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina people Category:Yugoslavian generals
title: Jovan Divjak
